long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple calculator that can be easily and quickly accessed from your extension bar. 

It supports basic operations such and addition, subtraction, multiplication and division, with results being rounded to 2 digits. 

For ease of use it supports keyboard input for all operations including for deleting inputs.

Known bugs: for big calculations it will not wrap the text to the input field.
